casebody.data:
Jacob SPANIER, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 3, 1924.) No. 77. Samuel W. Altman, of New York City (Milton S. Cohn and Irving D. Lipkowitz. both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. William Hayward, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Elmer H. Lemon, Sp. Asst. U. S. Atty., of Middletown, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before HOUGH and MANTON, Circuit Judges, and LEARNED HAND, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
